jade.core.sam
Interface SAMInfoHandler

public interface SAMInfoHandler

The interface to be implemented by classes that can be used to handle SAM information collected by the SAM Service. The default implementation used by the SAM Service simply writes a csv file for each monitored entity and counter. Developers can provide their own implementation to handle SAM information in an application specific way (e.g. storing SAM information in a DB)
